title: About
text:
About this site
This site contains my experience diving in various marine ecosystems as well as a few projects and papers I have written over the course of my undergraduate education at UCSB.

title: Naomi Howard
text:
About Me!
My name is Naomi Howard and I am a junior pursuing a Bachelor of Science (B.S.) in Environmental Studies at UCSB. Some of my passions include scuba diving, coastal policy, and climate change mitigation. In my free time, I love to surf, swim, shop, and try new restaurants in downtown SB!


Education
B.S. in Environmental Studies (Graduation Year: June 2025)
University of California, Santa Barbara (UCSB)


Experience
Research and Communication Intern - UCSB Marine Science Institute
April 2024 - Present
Undergraduate Research Assistant - PISCO Invertebrate Lab
March 2024 - Present

title: My Diving Experiences!
text: Here are a few photos consisting of some of my experiences diving! These photos are taken in Tahiti and Channel Islands National Park.
